page.title: 10HORSES IN CULMSTOCK
page.content: Horse-riding is a popular sport and horses for racing and riding are well catered for. At POND FARM there is an impressive training establishment - founded in 1977 - for 32 National Hunt Race Horses and 18 other Race Horses being presented for the Flat. A seven-furlong all-weather Gallop has been constructed and a snow-blowing machine bought to keep it clear. The Stables, sited on a 300 acre farm, house a walking machine, a weighing machine, an Equine Pool and a solarium as well as many paddocks. There is a bungalow for staff and a hostel for 15 stable lads, a covered ride and a laboratory to check the blood counts of the horses. At BENSHAYNE FARM there is a large Stable Complex with horses for riding.
